document_data.name: Angalar
document_data.mainbody: '''Angalar''' was a mage of the [[Vilhon Reach]] that was active in the late 9{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: He made a fortune between {{yearlink|860}} and {{yearlink|880}} [[DR]], selling minor magic he crafted. Amongst the objects he crafted was the [[Eye of Angalar]], one of his rarest and most powerful.
